overview: In 2023, Sharon is eighty years old and still shines as much. A man questions her about her life in order to write on her. But memory is not linear. Sharon remembers the big moments and the little details but not always the before or the after. She takes her box of photos and plunges herself in the past.
tagline: A fictionalized tribute to Sharon Tate, revisiting the night of August 9, 1969, in Los Angeles.
title: Fairy Tate
